title: unspecified error occurred please check the logs for more information!!!!!!!!!!!!
body:
well i have this error message, ive tried re installing like 8 times now, ive restarded my pc aswell.... ive tried entering

C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions\lol_game_client_sln

hand deleting the the contents, but there is nothing in there? anyone know a fix???

replies.body:
Are you still experiencing this issue? If so, I recommend checking out our [Patching Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues), which consolidates the most common fixes for issues while patching.

Let me know if this helped resolve the issue.
Uninstall win10 anniversary update if you got it
my system's in french so idont really know the exact path. Look around in the update/security settings, it should be in the recovery tab
o know i lil french, maybe tell the path?
im in update setting, but i dont find a wey to "downgrade"
